entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
